song_lyric:
Rain-drenched roads
Matching steps
and Let-down hair
And someone's laughter too

City nights
Oh
the city sighs

Then loneliness
Lingers in the air
ooh yeah

And so it's said that I left my heart
I left it in a lost Taipei with you

come on come on

Oh don't be so stingy now I want it on my wall
come on come on

Don't make a sound
Close the door behind
oh yeah

wondering feet
They won't go home
